h1: How Many Calories in a Whopper?
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, ketchup, mayo; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and exact ingredients. Check Burger King app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper has about 670 kcal, with 28 g protein and 51 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a whopper without mayo?
faqs.a: About 580 kcal, saving roughly 90 kcal from removing the mayo.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Approximately 28 g of protein per standard Whopper.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Around 980 mg of sodium, mostly from the bun and condiments.

faqs.q: Are there trans fats in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1 g of trans fat per Whopper from the beef patty.
